name: Brute Style

prerequisites: Str 15, Int 13, Combat Reflexes, Improved Overrun, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Vicious Stomp, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: While using this style, you can use your Vicious Stomp feat against any opponent within 10 feet of you, as long as it is within your natural reach. If you donâ€™t have the Vicious Stomp feat, you gain no benefit from this feat.
normal: The Vicious Stomp feat only works against an opponent that falls prone adjacent to you.
